component.name: InlineField
component.description: Horizontal label-value pair for compact inline form controls or display fields.

useCases: Pairing a label with a small inline control (toggle, select, input)
Displaying label-value pairs in settings or detail panels
Compact filter rows with label and control side by side

commonPatterns.name: with-switch
commonPatterns.description: Inline label with a toggle switch

commonPatterns.name: with-select
commonPatterns.description: Inline label with a select dropdown

commonPatterns.name: with-input
commonPatterns.description: Inline label with a text input

antiPatterns.scenario: Using InlineField for full-width form layouts
antiPatterns.reason: InlineField is designed for compact horizontal label-control pairs
antiPatterns.alternative: Use Field for standard stacked label-above-input form layouts

antiPatterns.scenario: Nesting multiple controls inside one InlineField
antiPatterns.reason: The layout assumes a single label and a single control child
antiPatterns.alternative: Use separate InlineField components for each control

slots.label: ReactNode rendered as a muted label-sm span to the left
slots.children: ReactNode for the inline control or display value

responsive.mobile: Flexbox layout; wraps if content is too wide

accessibility.screenReader: Label text is read; child control provides its own accessible name
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus targets the child control directly

rules: Always provide children — the inline control or value
Label is optional but recommended for accessibility
Label renders with label-sm and text-muted-foreground styling
Use for compact settings rows — not for primary form fields
Pair with size="inline" variants of Input and Select for consistent sizing

aiHints.context: Use InlineField for compact horizontal label-control pairs in settings panels, toolbars, or detail views. For standard stacked form fields with validation and help text, use Field instead. InlineField is intentionally minimal — just a flex row with a label and child.
